column4: I just bought an iPod from the paw shop. I got GTkpod and it is screaming issues at me about "Could not open "(null)" for reading extended info.

Extended info will not be used." So i tried two other options. One is Banshee the other was the Hipo iPod management tool. I used Sound Juicer to rip the CD's i want to add to my iPod in m4a format and then tried to Shoot them over to the iPod. The Songs Show up in the List on the iPod but they wont play at all. in fact they just shoot me over to the menu again once the iPod Fails to play all the songs in the list. Whats going
